msg: Add 'title' and 'index' attributes to the <navigation> documents, to support XSLT-based breadcrumbs

msg: Change the proxy support: The <containers> nested element now supports a 'proxyport' attribute that will be applied to every nested container

msg: Provide a generic wrapper class for containers, which will replace the ProxyContainer
